name: DR. SMILEY'S FUNHOUSE
description:
a little passion project that took me about a week to make. i've been wanting to tell this story for a long time and i finally got around to doing it.

play as Adrian, a troubled child who's thrown into a situation due to circumstances out of their control.

whats in the demo:

  • two endings
  • preview of two of the main characters

what will be in the full game:

  • many more characters
  • lots more dialogue
  • multiple endings

i have no idea when the full game will be out. i have a lot of writing and drawing to do before then.

comments and critiques (or noticeable errors) are very welcome! this is my first game and id love to know how i can improve it before the full game comes out.

stuff used:
photoshop cs6
my trackpad
logic pro x
renpy
